h2_title: All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong
content: **Give the Special-made-Bone-Strengthening Pellet to Chen Loong and be transported to the Zodiac Village.**
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Achievements_and_Trophies_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Achievements and Trophies Guide', specifically from the subsection 'All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Secret in the Scroll'.
The content is as follows:
**Give the Special-made-Bone-Strengthening Pellet to Chen Loong and be transported to the Zodiac Village.**
